channel.title: NEWBIE on Rabbit Hole 223
channel.description: Recent content in NEWBIE on Rabbit Hole 223

item.title: Let me teach you how not to start growing mushrooms at home
item.description: Introduction I love eating mushrooms of all kinds, funny I am the only one in my family who does. When I started watching a few online videos of mushroom growers. I live in Texas so even if I wanted to psilocybin is not a option. We weight the substrate as part of the product here and your life is over. I really enjoyed PhillyGoldenTeacher and therookiemycologistcontent and figured well all mushrooms should grow the same right?
